name: create-github-app-token
description: Generates a GitHub App installation token for authentication
helpMarkDown: Use this task to generate a GitHub App installation token for API authentication
author: Tiago Pascoal

inputs.name: githubAppConnection
inputs.label: GitHub App Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitHub App connection to use. If not set, the other inputs will be used instead. This is the preferred way to use this task.

inputs.name: owner
inputs.label: Owner Name (organization, user, or enterprise)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitHub organization name, user name, or enterprise slug where the app is installed. Required for enterprise account types.

inputs.name: accountType
inputs.label: Account Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of account to use. Can be 'organization', 'user', or 'enterprise'. (required if repositories is not set)

inputs.name: repositories
inputs.label: Repositories (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitHub repository(ies) to scope the token to. If empty it will be scoped to the organization. CSV

inputs.name: appClientId
inputs.label: GitHub App Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GitHub App ID (found in the app settings)

inputs.name: skipTokenRevoke
inputs.label: Skip Token Revocation
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the token will not be automatically revoked at the end of the job. Set to false to revoke the token.

outputVariables.name: installationId
outputVariables.description: The ID of the GitHub App installation

outputVariables.name: tokenExpiration
outputVariables.description: The expiration date and time of the generated token (ISO 8601 format)
